channel.title: Decide Fate [Ability Rework]
channel.description:
>**Decide Fate -** Decide an accused player's fate. If you pardon they will be pardoned. If you guilty they will be guiltied.
I propose the above as a replacement for the current ability:
>**Decide Fate -** Make you wonder why nothing happened. Did you use Royal Finger today and forget? Are you a possessed King? Why is the button greyed out and disabled, I don't understand ...

item.title: Decide Fate [Ability Rework]
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Decide Fate - Decide an accused player’s fate. If you pardon they will be pardoned. If you guilty they will be guiltied.

I propose the above as a replacement for the current ability:

Decide Fate - Make you wonder why nothing happened. Did you use Royal Finger today and forget? Are you a possessed King? Why is the button greyed out and disabled, I don’t understand …
